meanings.definition: Make sensitive or aware to a particular stimulus or situation.
meanings.sent1: The training session sensitizes employees to the importance of safety procedures.
meanings.sent2: The loud noise sensitizes the baby to sudden sounds.
meanings.sent3: The movie sensitizes the audience to the struggles of the main character in a touching way.
meanings.sent4: The experience sensitizes you to the fragility of life like a delicate flower in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The vivid colors of the painting sensitizes viewers to the artist's emotions.

meanings.definition: Cause to respond to certain stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The medication sensitizes the skin to sunlight, causing a reaction.
meanings.sent2: The repeated exposure sensitizes the body to allergens over time.
meanings.sent3: The joke sensitizes the audience to burst into laughter unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The intense workout sensitizes the muscles to grow stronger like steel under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The haunting melody sensitizes listeners to memories of the past.
